**Container Logs **
You can execute the following command to get the logs of containers and provide them here:
```
docker logs wrenai-wren-ui-1 >& wrenai-wren-ui.log && \
docker logs wrenai-wren-ai-service-1 >& wrenai-wren-ai-service.log && \
```
